      • setProxy

        public static void setProxy​(java.lang.String proxy)
        Sets the proxy to be used within the current request.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The new proxy string, containing both IP and port with a colon separating both.

        Randomizes the current User-Agent.

      • send

        public static java.net.http.HttpResponse<?> send​(java.lang.String url,
                                                 java.lang.String method,
                                                 java.net.http.HttpRequest.BodyPublisher publisher)
        Sends a HTTP(S) request to a specific URL, with a specific method and BodyPublisher.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to perform the request to.
        method - The method to perform the request with.
        publisher - The BodyPublisher to perform the request with.
        Returns:
        A HttpResponse object.

      • sendAsync

        public static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<?> sendAsync​(java.lang.String url,
                                                                  java.lang.String method,
                                                                  java.net.http.HttpRequest.BodyPublisher publisher)
        Sends an asynchronous HTTP(S) request to a specific URL, with a specific method and BodyPublisher.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to perform the request to.
        method - The method to perform the request with.
        publisher - The BodyPublisher to perform the request with.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture object containing a HttpResponse object.
